ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW YORK, 1969.
It’s trashy. It’s punk. It’s dangerous.
Vampirella LOVES it. What was it like when Vampi first got to Earth? Take a trip, with JORDIE BELLAIRE (Buffy) and DREW MOSS (Star Wars).
